classes.name: Giveaways
classes.description:
Main Giveaways class.

Type parameters:

- TDatabaseType (@see DatabaseType) - The database type that will be used in the module.

props.name: options
props.description: Completed, filled and fixed @see Giveaways configuration.

props.name: db
props.description: External database (such as Enmap or MongoDB) if used.

props.name: database
props.description: Database Manager.

props.name: _messageUtils
props.description: Message utils instance.

methods.name: _init
methods.description: Initialize the database connection and initialize the @see Giveaways module.

methods.name: _sendUpdateMessage
methods.description: Sends the @see Giveaways module update state in the console.

methods.name: start
methods.description: Starts the giveaway.

events.name: ready
events.description: Emits when the @see Giveaways module is ready.

events.name: databaseConnect
events.description: Emits when the @see Giveaways module establishes the database connection.

events.name: giveawayStart
events.description: Emits when a giveaway is started.

events.name: giveawayRestart
events.description: Emits when a giveaway is restarted.

events.name: giveawayEnd
events.description: Emits when a giveaway is ended.

events.name: giveawayReroll
events.description: Emits when a giveaway is rerolled.

classes.name: Giveaway
classes.description:
Class that represents the Giveaway object.

Type parameters:

- TDatabaseType (@see DatabaseType) The database type that will be used in the module.

props.name: _giveaways
props.description: Giveaways instance.

props.name: _messageUtils
props.description: Message utils instance.

props.name: raw
props.description: Raw giveaway object.

props.name: id
props.description: Giveaway ID.

props.name: prize
props.description: Giveaway prize.

props.name: time
props.description: Giveaway time.

props.name: state
props.description: Giveaway state.

props.name: winnersCount
props.description: Number of possible winners in the giveaway.

props.name: startTimestamp
props.description: Giveaway start timestamp.

props.name: endTimestamp
props.description: Giveaway end timestamp.

props.name: messageID
props.description: Giveaway message ID.

props.name: guild
props.description: Guild where the giveaway was created.

props.name: host
props.description: User who created the giveaway.

props.name: channel
props.description: Channel where the giveaway was created.

props.name: messageURL
props.description: Giveaway message URL.

props.name: isEnded
props.description: Determines if the giveaway was ended in database.

props.name: entriesArray
props.description: Array of user IDs of users that have entered the giveaway.

props.name: entries
props.description: Number of giveaway entries.

props.name: messageProps
props.description: Message data properties for embeds and buttons.

props.name: isFinished
props.description: Determines if the giveaway's time is up or if the giveaway was ended forcefully.

methods.name: sync
methods.description: Syncs the constructor properties with specified raw giveaway object.

params.name: giveaway
params.description: Giveaway object to sync the constructor properties with.

methods.name: _pickWinners
methods.description: Shuffles all the giveaway entries and randomly picks the winners.

returns.description: Array of users that were picked as the winners.

methods.name: _shuffleArray
methods.description: Shuffles an array and returns it.

methods.name: _getFromDatabase
methods.description: Gets the giveaway data and its index in guild giveaways array from database.

params.name: guildID
params.description: Guild ID to get the giveaways array from.

methods.name: toJSON
methods.description: Converts the Giveaway instance to a plain object representation.

returns.description: Plain object representation of Giveaway instance.

props.name: giveaways
props.description: Giveaways instance.

props.name: db
props.description: Database instance.

props.name: databaseType
props.description: Database type.

props.name: jsonParser
props.description: JSON parser instance.

methods.name: getKeys
methods.description: Gets the object keys in database root or in object by specified key.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Gets the value from database by specified key.

methods.name: fetch
methods.description:
Gets the value from database by specified key.

- This method is an alias to {@link DatabaseManager.get()} method.

methods.name: has
methods.description: Determines if specified key exists in database.

returns.description: Boolean value that determines if specified key exists in database.

methods.name: includes
methods.description:
Determines if specified key exists in database.

- This method is an alias to {@link DatabaseManager.has()} method.

returns.description: Boolean value that determines if specified key exists in database.

methods.name: set
methods.description: Sets data in database.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears the whole database.

methods.name: deleteAll
methods.description:
Clears the whole database.

- This method is an alias to {@link DatabaseManager.clear()} method.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a number to the data in database.

methods.name: subtract
methods.description: Subtracts a number to the data in database.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes the data from database.

methods.name: push
methods.description: Pushes a value into specified array in database.

params.name: value
params.description: Any value to push into database array.

methods.name: pull
methods.description: Changes the specified element's value in a specified array in the database.

params.name: index
params.description: The index in the target array.

methods.name: pop
methods.description: Removes an element from a specified array in the database.

params.name: index
params.description: The index in the target array.

methods.name: all
methods.description: Gets the whole database object.

typedefs.name: IGiveaway
typedefs.description:
An object that contains an information about a giveaway.

Type parameters:

- TDatabaseType (@see DatabaseType) - The database type that will be used in the module.

props.name: id
props.description: The ID of the giveaway.

props.name: prize
props.description: The prize of the giveaway.

props.name: time
props.description: The time of the giveaway.

props.name: state
props.description: The state of the giveaway.

props.name: winnersCount
props.description: The number of possible winners in the giveaway.

props.name: startTimestamp
props.description: The timestamp when the giveaway started.

props.name: isEnded
props.description: Determines if the giveaway was ended in the database.

props.name: endTimestamp
props.description: The timestamp when the giveaway ended.

props.name: hostMemberID
props.description: The ID of the host member.

props.name: channelID
props.description: The ID of the channel where the giveaway is held.

props.name: messageID
props.description: The ID of the giveaway message.

props.name: messageURL
props.description: The URL of the giveaway message.

props.name: guildID
props.description: The ID of the guild where the giveaway is held.

props.name: entries
props.description: The number of giveaway entries.

props.name: entriesArray
props.description: The array of user IDs of users that have entered the giveaway.

props.name: messageProps
props.description: The message data properties for embeds and buttons.

typedefs.name: IGiveawayRerollEmbeds
typedefs.description: An interface containing embed objects for various giveaway reroll cases.

props.name: onlyHostCanReroll
props.description: The options for the embed when only the host can reroll.

props.name: newGiveawayMessage
props.description: The options for the embed when sending a new giveaway message.

props.name: successMessage
props.description: The options for the embed when the giveaway is successful.

typedefs.name: IGiveawayFinishEmbeds
typedefs.description: An interface containing embed objects for various giveaway finish cases.

props.name: newGiveawayMessage
props.description: The options for the embed when sending a new giveaway message.

props.name: endMessage
props.description: The options for the embed when the giveaway has ended.

props.name: noWinners
props.description: The options for the embed when there are no winners for the giveaway.

props.name: noWinnersEndMessage
props.description: The options for the embed when there are no winners for the giveaway and it has ended.

typedefs.name: IGiveawayMessageProps
typedefs.description: An interface that contains the data properties for embeds and buttons.

props.name: embeds
props.description: The embed objects for the giveaway message.

props.name: buttons
props.description: The button objects for the giveaway message.

typedefs.name: IGiveawayEmbeds
typedefs.description: An interface containing different types of giveaway embeds in the IGiveaways class.

props.name: start
props.description: Message embed data for cases when the giveaway has started.

props.name: reroll
props.description: Message embed data for cases when rerolling the giveaway.

props.name: finish
props.description: Message embed data for cases when the giveaway has finished.

typedefs.name: IGiveawayMessageButtons
typedefs.description: An object that contains the giveaway buttons that may be set up.

props.name: joinGiveawayButton
props.description: The options for the join giveaway button.

props.name: rerollButton
props.description: The options for the reroll button.

props.name: goToMessageButton
props.description: The options for the go to message button.

typedefs.name: GiveawayWithoutInternalProps
typedefs.description: An object that contains an information about a giveaway without internal props.

props.name: id
props.description: The ID of the giveaway.

props.name: prize
props.description: The prize of the giveaway.

props.name: time
props.description: The time of the giveaway.

props.name: winnersCount
props.description: The number of possible winners in the giveaway.

props.name: startTimestamp
props.description: The timestamp when the giveaway started.

props.name: endTimestamp
props.description: The timestamp when the giveaway ended.

props.name: hostMemberID
props.description: The ID of the host member.

props.name: channelID
props.description: The ID of the channel where the giveaway is held.

props.name: messageID
props.description: The ID of the giveaway message.

props.name: messageURL
props.description: The URL of the giveaway message.

props.name: guildID
props.description: The ID of the guild where the giveaway is held.

props.name: entriesArray
props.description: The array of user IDs of users that have entered the giveaway.

props.name: messageProps
props.description: The message data properties for embeds and buttons.

typedefs.name: GiveawayState
typedefs.description: An enum that determines the state of a giveaway.

props.name: STARTED
props.description: The giveaway has started.

props.name: ENDED
props.description: The giveaway has ended.

typedefs.name: IGiveawaysConfiguration
typedefs.description:
Full @see Giveaways class configuration object.

Type parameters:

- TDatabaseType (@see TDatabaseType) - The database type that will determine which connection configuration should be used.

props.name: database
props.description: Database type to use.

props.name: connection
props.description: Database type to use.

props.name: giveawaysCheckingInterval
props.description: Determines how often the giveaways ending state will be checked (in ms). Default: 1000.

props.name: debug
props.description: Determines if debug mode is enabled. Default: false.

props.name: minGiveawayEntries
props.description: Determines the minimum required giveaway entries to draw the winner. Default: 1

props.name: updatesChecker
props.description: Updates checker configuration.

props.name: configurationChecker
props.description: Giveaways config checker configuration.

typedefs.name: IGiveawaysOptionalConfiguration
typedefs.description: Optional configuration for the @see Giveaways class.

props.name: giveawaysCheckingInterval
props.description: Determines how often the giveaways ending state will be checked (in ms). Default: 1000.

props.name: debug
props.description: Determines if debug mode is enabled. Default: false.

props.name: minGiveawayEntries
props.description: Determines the minimum required giveaway entries to draw the winner. Default: 1

props.name: updatesChecker
props.description: Updates checker configuration.

props.name: configurationChecker
props.description: Giveaways config checker configuration.

typedefs.name: IUpdateCheckerConfiguration
typedefs.description: Configuration for the updates checker.

props.name: checkUpdates
props.description: Sends the update state message in console on start. Default: true.

props.name: upToDateMessage
props.description: Sends the message in console on start if module is up to date. Default: false.

typedefs.name: IGiveawaysConfigCheckerConfiguration
typedefs.description: Configuration for the configuration checker.

props.name: ignoreInvalidTypes
props.description: Allows the method to ignore the options with invalid types. Default: false.

props.name: ignoreUnspecifiedOptions
props.description: Allows the method to ignore the unspecified options. Default: true.

props.name: ignoreInvalidOptions
props.description: Allows the method to ignore the unexisting options. Default: false.

props.name: showProblems
props.description: Allows the method to show all the problems in the console. Default: true.

props.name: sendLog
props.description:
Allows the method to send the result in the console.
Requires the 'showProblems' or 'sendLog' options to set. Default: true.

props.name: sendSuccessLog
props.description: Allows the method to send the result if no problems were found. Default: false.

typedefs.name: IJSONDatabaseConfiguration
typedefs.description: JSON database configuration.

props.name: path
props.description: Full path to a JSON storage file. Default: './giveaways.json'.

props.name: checkDatabase
props.description: Checks the if there are errors in database file. Default: true.

props.name: checkingCountdown
props.description: Determines how often the database file will be checked (in ms). Default: 1000.

typedefs.name: IGiveawayData
typedefs.description: An object that contains an information about a giveaway that is required fo starting..

props.name: prize
props.description: The prize of the giveaway.

props.name: time
props.description: The time of the giveaway.

props.name: winnersCount
props.description: The number of possible winners in the giveaway.

props.name: hostMemberID
props.description: The ID of the host member.

props.name: channelID
props.description: The ID of the channel where the giveaway is held.

props.name: guildID
props.description: The ID of the guild where the giveaway is held.

typedefs.name: IGiveawayStartConfig
typedefs.description: Giveaway start config.

props.name: prize
props.description: The prize of the giveaway.

props.name: time
props.description: The time of the giveaway.

props.name: winnersCount
props.description: The number of possible winners in the giveaway.

props.name: hostMemberID
props.description: The ID of the host member.

props.name: channelID
props.description: The ID of the channel where the giveaway is held.

props.name: guildID
props.description: The ID of the guild where the giveaway is held.

props.name: buttons
props.description: Giveaway buttons object.

props.name: defineEmbedStrings
props.description: Giveaway buttons object.

typedefs.name: IGiveawayButtons
typedefs.description: Giveaway buttons that may be specified.

props.name: joinGiveawayButton
props.description: Button object for the "join giveaway" button.

props.name: rerollButton
props.description: Button object for the "reroll" button.

props.name: goToMessageButton
props.description: Link button object for the "go to message" button.

typedefs.name: ILinkButton
typedefs.description:
Link button object.

Please note that URL is not required as it's being applied after starting the giveaway.

props.name: text
props.description: Button text string.

props.name: emoji
props.description: Emoji string.

props.name: url
props.description: URL that the button will take to.

typedefs.name: DefineEmbedStringsCallback
typedefs.description: A function that defines the embed strings used in the giveaway.

params.name: giveaway
params.description: An object containing information about the giveaway.

returns.description: - An object containing the defined embed strings.

typedefs.name: IGiveawayStartOptions
typedefs.description: Giveaway start options.

props.name: buttons
props.description: Giveaway buttons object.

props.name: defineEmbedStrings
props.description: Giveaway buttons object.

typedefs.name: IGiveawayMessages
typedefs.description: An object that contains messages that are sent in various giveaway cases, such as end with winners or without winners.

props.name: onlyHostCanReroll
props.description: The message sent in the giveaway channel when not a giveaway host tries to do a reroll.

props.name: newGiveawayMessage
props.description: Original giveaway message will be edited with this message object.

props.name: successMessage
props.description: The message sent in the giveaway channel when a giveaway ends without winners.

typedefs.name: GiveawayFinishCallback
typedefs.description: A function that is called when giveaway is finished.

params.name: winnersString
params.description: A string that contains the users that won the giveaway separated with comma.

params.name: numberOfWinners
params.description: Number of winners that were picked.

typedefs.name: GiveawayRerollCallback
typedefs.description: A function that is called when giveaway winners are rerolled.

params.name: winnersString
params.description: A string that contains the users that won the giveaway separated with comma.

params.name: numberOfWinners
params.description: Number of winners that were picked.

typedefs.name: IEmbedStringsDefinitions
typedefs.description: Object containing embed string definitions used in the IGiveaways class.

props.name: start
props.description: This object is used in the original giveaway message that people will use to join the giveaway.

props.name: finish
props.description: This function is called and all returned message objects are extracted and used when the giveaway is finished.

props.name: reroll
props.description: This function is called and all returned message objects are extracted and used when the giveaway winners are rerolled.

typedefs.name: IGiveawayButtonOptions
typedefs.description: Button object.

props.name: text
props.description: Button text string.

props.name: emoji
props.description: Emoji string.

props.name: style
props.description: Button style.

typedefs.name: IGiveawayEmbedOptions
typedefs.description: Message embed options.

props.name: messageContent
props.description: The content of the message. If only this is specified

props.name: title
props.description: The title of the embed.

props.name: titleIcon
props.description: The icon of the title in the embed.

props.name: titleIconURL
props.description: The url of the icon of the title in the embed.

props.name: description
props.description: The description of the embed.

props.name: footer
props.description: The footer of the embed.

props.name: footerIcon
props.description: The icon of the footer in the embed.

props.name: thumbnailURL
props.description: Embed thumbnail.

props.name: imageURL
props.description: Embed Image URL.

props.name: color
props.description: The color of the embed.

typedefs.name: DatabaseConnectionOptions<TDatabaseType>
typedefs.description:
Database connection options based on the used database type.

Type parameters:

- TDatabaseType (@see TDatabaseType) - The database type that will determine which connection configuration should be used.

typedefs.name: Database<TDatabaseType>
typedefs.description: External database object based on the used database type.
see:
null - JSON database management object - `null`
is because it's not an external database - JSON is being parsed by the module.

Type parameters:

- TDatabaseType (@see TDatabaseType) - The database type that will determine which connection configuration should be used.

typedefs.name: IDatabaseStructure
typedefs.description: An interface containing the structure of the database used in the IGiveaways class.

props.name: guildID
props.description: Guild ID that stores the giveaways array

props.name: giveaways
props.description: Giveaways array property inside the [guildID] object in database.

typedefs.name: IDatabaseGiveaway
typedefs.description: The giveaway data that stored in database,

props.name: giveaway
props.description: Giveaway object.

props.name: giveawayIndex
props.description: Giveaway index in the guild giveaways array.

typedefs.name: IGiveawaysEvents
typedefs.description:
A type containing all the @see Giveaways events and their return types.

Type parameters:

- TDatabaseType (@see DatabaseType) - The database type that will be used in the module.

props.name: ready
props.description: Emits when the @see Giveaways is ready.

props.name: databaseConnect
props.description: Emits when the connection to the database is established.

props.name: giveawayStart
props.description: Emits when a giveaway is started.

props.name: giveawayRestart
props.description: Emits when a giveaway is rerolled.

props.name: giveawayEnd
props.description: Emits when a giveaway is rerolled.

props.name: giveawayReroll
props.description: Emits when a giveaway is rerolled.

typedefs.name: IGiveawayRerollEvent
typedefs.description:
Giveaway reroll event object.

Type parameters:

- TDatabaseType (@see DatabaseType) - The database type that will be used in the module.

props.name: giveaway
props.description: Giveaway instance.

props.name: newWinners
props.description: Array of the new picked winners after reroll.

typedefs.name: ILoggerColors
typedefs.description: An interface containing different colors that may be used in a logger.

props.name: red
props.description: The color red.

props.name: green
props.description: The color green.

props.name: yellow
props.description: The color yellow.

props.name: blue
props.description: The color blue.

props.name: magenta
props.description: The color magenta.

props.name: cyan
props.description: The color cyan.

props.name: white
props.description: The color white.

props.name: reset
props.description: The reset color.

props.name: black
props.description: The color black.

props.name: lightgray
props.description: The color light gray.

props.name: default
props.description: The default color.

props.name: darkgray
props.description: The color dark gray.

props.name: lightred
props.description: The color light red.

props.name: lightgreen
props.description: The color light green.

props.name: lightyellow
props.description: The color light yellow.

props.name: lightblue
props.description: The color light blue.

props.name: lightmagenta
props.description: The color light magenta.

props.name: lightcyan
props.description: The color light cyan.

typedefs.name: IUpdateState
typedefs.description: An object containing the data about available module updates.

props.name: updated
props.description: Whether an update is available or not.

props.name: installedVersion
props.description: The currently installed version.

props.name: availableVersion
props.description: The available version, if any.

typedefs.name: If
typedefs.description:
Represents the `if` statement on a type level.

Type parameters:

- `T` (@see boolean) - The boolean type to compare with.
- `IfTrue` (@see any) - The type that will be returned if `T` is `true`.
- `IfFalse` (@see any) - The type that will be returned if `T` is `false`.

typedefs.name: Optional
typedefs.description:
Makes the specified properties in `K` from the object in `T` optional.

Type parameters:

- `T` (@see object) - The object to get the properties from.
- `K` (keyof T) - The properties to make optional.

typedefs.name: FindCallback
typedefs.description:
A callback function that calls when finding an element in array.

Type parameters:

- `T` (@see any) - The type of item to be passed to the callback function.

params.name: item
params.description: The item to be passed to the callback function.

returns.description: The boolean value returned by the callback function.

typedefs.name: MapCallback
typedefs.description:
A callback function that calls when mapping the array using the @see Array.prototype.map method.

Type parameters:

- `T` (@see any) - The type of item to be passed to the callback function.
- `TReturnType` - (@see any) The type of value returned by the callback function.

params.name: item
params.description: The item to be passed to the callback function.

returns.description: The value returned by the callback function.

typedefs.name: IGiveaway<DatabaseType>
typedefs.description:
An object that contains an information about a giveaway.

Type parameters:

- TDatabaseType (@see DatabaseType) - The database type that will be used in the module.

props.name: id
props.description: The ID of the giveaway.

props.name: prize
props.description: The prize of the giveaway.

props.name: time
props.description: The time of the giveaway.

props.name: state
props.description: The state of the giveaway.

props.name: winnersCount
props.description: The number of possible winners in the giveaway.

props.name: startTimestamp
props.description: The timestamp when the giveaway started.

props.name: isEnded
props.description: Determines if the giveaway was ended in the database.

props.name: endTimestamp
props.description: The timestamp when the giveaway ended.

props.name: hostMemberID
props.description: The ID of the host member.

props.name: channelID
props.description: The ID of the channel where the giveaway is held.

props.name: messageID
props.description: The ID of the giveaway message.

props.name: messageURL
props.description: The URL of the giveaway message.

props.name: guildID
props.description: The ID of the guild where the giveaway is held.

props.name: entries
props.description: The number of giveaway entries.

props.name: entriesArray
props.description: The array of user IDs of users that have entered the giveaway.

props.name: messageProps
props.description: The message data properties for embeds and buttons.

typedefs.name: DatabaseType
typedefs.description: An enum containing the possible database types.

props.name: JSON
props.description: The JSON database type.

props.name: MONGODB
props.description: The MongoDB database type.

props.name: ENMAP
props.description: The Enmap database type.
